StaFi DAO

StaFi DAO

StaFi DAO is a decentralized organization that governs the StaFi multi-network
ecosystem, enabling FIS holders to vote for key protocol parameters.

StaFi Treasury

StaFi DAO treasury is the pool of funds for the continuous growth and
development of StaFi protocol.

Forum

A home for sharing, and exploring, thoughts and ideas about the StaFi DAO.

rTokens

StaFi is a liquid staking service provider on the EVM and Cosmos Ecosystem
built with interoperability and collaboration in mind allowing users to
utilize their staked assets across multiple ecosystems.

Our rToken LSDs are available across various ecosystems, offering a
bridgeable, fluid, and user-friendly experience.

Explore rTokens

EVM and Solona rTokens

Other Ecosystems rTokens

All contract code and balances are publicly verifiable, and security
researchers are eligible for a bug bounty for reporting undiscovered
vulnerabilities.

Safety Mechanism

By the professional audit and insurance companies. The security of the StaFi
protocol is our highest priority.

Learn More

Bug Bounty

The ImmuneFi Bug Bounty Program is a plan that rewards individuals who find
vulnerabilities in our products.

Learn More

Audited and Verified

By professional auditing companies. The security of StaFi protocol is our
highest priority. StaFi is audited by leading cyber security agencies such as
CertiK and PeckShield to ensure the safety of our smart contracts.

Zellic

Zellic is a leading blockchain security firm with a proven track record of
identifying and remediating critical vulnerabilities

Learn More

At StaFi, we confidently engage PeckShield to conduct security evaluations on
our rFIS, rETH v1, rETH v2, rETH withdraw function, and rDEX code.

Learn More

StaFi has initiated a partnership with Blocksec to utilize our audit service
for the rETH withdraw function.

Learn More

StaFi and Certik have established a long-term partnership and utilized their
audit service to review the rBridge contract, rBridge StaFi Chain code, and
the rToken relay code.

Learn More
